dashboard.quickReference.safe: Safe: pH 6.5-8.5, Turbidity <1 NTU, DO >6 mg/L
dashboard.quickReference.warning: Warning: pH 6.0-6.5/8.5-9.0, Turbidity 1-4 NTU, DO 4-6 mg/L
dashboard.quickReference.danger: Danger: pH <6.0/>9.0, Turbidity >4 NTU, DO <4 mg/L
